mapper.select: select u_prof_no as no, u_prof_id as id, u_prof_name as name, u_prof_gender as gender, u_prof_code as code, u_prof_division as division, u_prof_pwd as pwd, u_prof_register as register, u_prof_phone as phone, u_prof_addr as addr, u_prof_email as email, u_prof_grade as grade, u_prof_ssn as ssn, u_prof_forei as forei, u_prof_entrydate as entrydate, u_prof_leavedate as leavedate from u_professor
